sentence.Network_en: Introduction of electronic point-of-sale systems is improving efficiency.
sentence.Network_cn: 引进销售点电子系统提高了效率。

sentence.Network_en: More information on healthy foods should be provided at the point of sale .
sentence.Network_cn: 销售点应提供更多有关健康食品的资料。

sentence.Network_en: Demand-chain management captures information on consumer behaviour at the point of sale and feeds it up the supply chain.
sentence.Network_cn: 需求环节的管理层会捕捉销售点顾客购物行为的信息，然后把信息再反馈给供应环节。

point of invocation 得点point of sale terminal 出售点终端point of sales 销售点
这就是销售点情报系统(Point of sales)。此系统通过货品条形码的扫描，可实时收集商店各类销售、进货、库存等数据。
